mapper.select: SELECT l.*, le.courseId as lesson_courseId, le.name as lesson_name, le.startTime as lesson_startTime, le.endTime as lesson_endTime, le.note as lesson_note FROM learning l, lesson le WHERE studentId = #{studentId} AND l.lessonId= le.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO learning (lessonId, stageId, id, studentId) VALUES( #{lessonId}, #{stageId}, #{id}, #{studentId})
